details.content:
Here's the Playing XI for #CSKvSRH #VIVOIPL #Final pic.twitter.com/cBo0YoerED

— IndianPremierLeague (@IPL) May 27, 2018

Final. 1.5: WICKET! S Goswami (5) is out, run out (Karn Sharma), 12/1 https://t.co/sltQanUwIw #CSKvSRH

— IndianPremierLeague (@IPL) May 27, 2018
SRH skipper Kane Williamson is the Orange purple cap holder with +688 runs. The closest contestant playing today's final is CSK's Ambati Rayidu with 586 runs. (Photo | AP)
Shikhar Dhawan brings up SRH's fifty with a four! SRH 50-1 in 6.5 overs.
Williamson smashes DJ Bravo for the second six of his innings! SRH 62-1 after 8 overs.
Ravindra Jadeja sends Shikhar Dhawan packing! Clean bowled.
Shakib Al Hasan joins his captain in the crease.
Shakib smashes R Jadeja for four to take SRH to 90-2 after 11 overs.

Four of CSK's playing eleven today features in the season's Top 10 list for 'Most Maiden Overs'- namely Lungi Ngidi, Deepak Chahar, Shardul Thakur and Dwayne Bravo. One tough bowling line-up to deal with!

WICKET! MS Dhoni stumps the in-form SRH skipper of a Karn Sharma delivery. Williamson departs for a well played 47 of 36 balls. 
SRH 101/3 in 12.2 Overs.

Kalakkal breakthrough! Thala went back to the leggie to grab the crucial breakthrough! He Kane walk back to the dugout. #WhistlePodu #Yellove #YelloveFinals #CSKvSRH 💛🦁

— Chennai Super Kings (@ChennaiIPL) May 27, 2018
17 innings, 734 runs, 8 fifties, 64 boundaries, 28 sixers.. Take a bow Kane Williamson! (Photo | Dinamani)
The experienced Yusuf Pathan is the new batsman coming in for SRH.
WICKET! Shakib caught by Suresh Raina off a DJ Bravo delivery. (Photo | AP)
CSK bowlers so far...
Can Yusuf deliver when it matters the most?  (Photo | AP)
WICKET! Lungi Ngidi dimisses Deepak Hooda for just 3 runs. SRH at 144/5 at 17 overs.
Carlos Brathwaite walks into the crease.
Another expensive spell by Bravo as he goes of 46 of his 4 overs at an Econ Rate of 11.5.

SIX
Brathwaite goes for the long-on as he finishes the 19th over with a six after facing 2 dots.#CSKvSRH #IPL2018Final #IPL2018

— SunRisers Hyderabad (@SunRisers) May 27, 2018
Shardul Thakur steps up to bowl the final over of the innings. (Photo | AP)
Another six from Brathwaite! SRH at 178/5 with one ball left to play.
Yusuf Pathan sets a new personal best of the season - 45* of 25 deliveries. A valuable knock under pressure.
WICKET! Brathwaite caught by Ambati Rayidu of the last ball of the innings.
SRH reach 178/6 at 20 overs.

CSK need to score close to nine runs an over to lift the trophy.

via GIPHY
Shane Watson and Faf Du Plesis give CSK the flying start they want
WICKET! Sandeep Sharma dismisses danger man Du Plesis for 10 runs of 11 deliveries. (Photo | PTI)

6 runs off the 4th over with a wicket from the last delivery
Bhuvi is in for the 5th over as Raina comes in at No.3#CSKvSRH #IPL2018 #IPL2018Final

— SunRisers Hyderabad (@SunRisers) May 27, 2018
Suresh Raina is the new batsman in.

Bhuvneshwar Kumar and Sandeep Sharma keep CSK quiet for the first six overs.
CSK 35/1 after 6 overs.
Bowling change by SRH. Siddarth Kaul brought in. (Photo | AP)
Shane Watson punishes Kaul for 16 runs off his first over to bring CSK back to top gear.

Boundary! Boundary Boundary! Chinna Thala into the act! #WhistlePodu #Yellove #YelloveFinals #CSKvSRH 💛🦁

— Chennai Super Kings (@ChennaiIPL) May 27, 2018
Good start for Rashid Khan; Raina, Watson manages only four runs of his over. CSK 56/1 after 8 overs.
Both Rashid Khan and Siddarth Kaul have bagged 21 wickets so far in the tournament, only three less that current Purple cap holder Andrew Tye of KXI Punjab.
Siddarth Kaul keeps leaking runs as the batsmen 10 runs off his second over already with 2 balls left.
Be scared SRH, Shane Watson is in the mood! (Photo | AP)
FIFTY! Shane Watson plays a maximum of Shakib Al Hasan to reach the fist half-century of IPL 2018 final.

Shane Watson 53 (35) 3x4 4X6

via GIPHY
Suresh Raina and Shane Watson have made 87 runs off 48 balls so far. Crucial partnership that might seal the fate of the match.
Another six by Shane Watson! He moves to 70 off 42 deliveries.
Sandeep Sharma hammered for three sixes in a row by Watson! CSK 131/1 after 12 overs.
Williamson brings Carlos Brathwaite into the attack. Can he make a difference ?

Shane Watson at the moment

via GIPHY
Into the nineties! S Watson 91* (47)
A good over from Rashid Khan to give his side some relief, Only one run of it. CSK 146/2 after 15.
Watson back on strike, could this be the delivery !

Shane Watson on 99!

via GIPHY
HUNDRED! Shane Watson scores second century of the season! Brilliant innings under pressure by the Aussie
11 runs between Chennai Super Kings and IPL 2018 !

The entire #CSKFamily up on their feet for a standing ovation! Take a bow Watto! #whistlepodu #yellove #YelloveFinals #CSKvSRH 🦁💛 @ShaneRWatson33 pic.twitter.com/8F7dW9bG17

— Chennai Super Kings (@ChennaiIPL) May 27, 2018
Yellow Army a sixer away from ultimate triumph...
Scores level!

YELLOW POWER!

via GIPHY
Chennai Super Kings are the champions of IPL 2018!
Congrats CSK for third IPL title.
What an innings!!
From being labelled "Old men's army" to third IPL title... Full credits to Thala Dhoni and his boys. What a way to make a comeback to the tournament>

Winning moments

Chennai are Super Kings. A fairytale comeback as @ChennaiIPL beat #SRH by 8 wickets to seal their third #VIVOIPL Trophy 🏆🏆🏆. This is their moment to cherish, a moment to savour. pic.twitter.com/ABMnOGiEkg

— IndianPremierLeague (@IPL) May 27, 2018
